title: Evidence-Based Project Learning for Strengthening Genetic Counseling Expert Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational genetics theories and experience in analyzing clinical cases
context.additional_context: Team-based project execution in digital environments with parallel expert mentoring

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real clinical cases and write genetic disease risk assessment reports.
Learners can develop genetic counseling education modules by applying evidence-based instructional design principles.
Learners can propose genetic intervention strategies through multidisciplinary team collaboration.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
